name: Monkey Business (itch) (AngaelusM)
description:
Set in the Jungle, a Sorcerer has stolen a Mystical Crystal that keeps peace and harmony among the Monkey Clan. 

With your help, the young monkey Prince needs to cross the forest and break all blocks to recover the Crystal.

Monkey Business is a breakout clone type of game, with some new elements added, plus the possibility to play it on easy or hard mode.
